ja498:5.4: Api te varaṁ attamano dadeyya → api nu te varaṁ attamano dadeyya (sya1ed, sya2ed); api nu te attamano varaṁ dade (mr)
ja498:7.1: Āhaññantu → āhaññare (sya1ed, sya2ed); āhaññaruṁ (pts-vp-pli1) | bherimudiṅgasaṅkhe → … saṅkhā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja498:14.1: Sohaṁ evaṁ pajānāmi → so ahaṁ suppajānāmi (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
ja498:15.2: dvipadākaniṭṭhā → dipadā kaniṭṭhā (bj, pts-vp-pli1); dvipadakaniṭṭhā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja498:24.4: Adhammakāro tava → adhammakāro ca te (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
